comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: 1869-1925. Painter. Studied at Académie Julian in Paris. Biography on this site, apparenlty from the book Artists in California 1786-1940. National Portrait Gallery in London has two of her painting. Disussed in Overcoming All Obstacles, book about women artists who studied at Académie Julian .

comment.author: 34427466731@N01
comment._content: that's a very finely rendered drawing.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: In 1913, she had taken a studio in New York and was "giving the dilightful teas tha distinguished her stay in San Francisco." (The San Francisco call., January 12, 1913, Page 33, col. 5) See also article about her in The Washington times., April 10, 1915, HOME EDITION, Page 8, "Climbs Ladder of Artistic Fame Without Loss of Feminine Charm", with photo.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thank you for finding these great resources. We'll add a little more information to this record the next time we update.
